Text: Really, where!?

When Lisa's down, 
 she drowns her 
 sorrows in drink... 
 I worry about her.
I doubt Lisa's happy \n about it.
You better have checked it. \n If I find any problems, \n it'll be on you, got it?
Hmm, well, I have heard \n stories of a rich ore \n deposit.
Conversation with Syd
Hey, Misai mentioned a \n rumor about a rich site.
She always takes on the \n burden of problems \n alone...
Hey, did you hear me?
Really, those two are \n brothers? They bear zero \n resemblance.
I wonder what Lisa's \n gonna do now.
Go on, take your portion \n while you still have \n something to take.
Conversation with Syd
That merchant Vogo \n is a real louse!
It's just a rumor, \n probably nothing to it.
Hm!?
Yeah, I'm getting \n the picture.
Nice! I'm surprised \n they had any money \n for us.
If anything, this is \n premium grade ore.
Even after I did all of \n the work... Oh well.
What about the whole \n replacing the shipment \n thing?
Oh, and Lisa said \n that's for you and \n your partner.
Oh... Alright.
Hmph. Where did \n you even find \n this stuff?
Any idea where \n she came from?
Hope you spend \n that wisely.

If the world wasn't what 
 it was, Lisa wouldn't 
 have to take on all this 
 trouble...
Hmph. \n Anyway, something's \n off with that girl.
Oh, sorry, what?

Well, I had a little 
 time on my hands, 
 being out of action 
 and all.
And there's more where that \n came from. Enough to live \n easy for a while.
And he knows it. That's \n why he acts like that.

Well, I suppose if the 
 world wasn't what it 
 was, anything could be 
 true...
Make sure to split it.
Right, so are you \n ready to sign off on \n the contract, Vogo?
I killed some of it \n reading the books in \n Lisa's study.
Well, Mustache \n is out of the way...
Yeah, it sounds like she \n can't handle this \n alone...
The stuff checks out. \n No flaws - they \n completed the order.
How are we going to \n replace the shipment so \n fast?
Defeat the Giant Nevi!
If you try anything \n else, it'll backfire.
Things are only gonna \n get worse from here on \n out.
That thing was pretending to be a pile of ore!?
He's right.
You can't \n push this...
I'd better ask \n Lisa about it.
But, Kat, I doubt it's \n called the Forbidden \n Land for nothing.
What's that guy's \n problem?
They're not blood related.
L-look at it... \n It's so sparkly...
We need him \n to sell our ore.
How do you \n know that!?
*sigh* When it rains, it \n pours. Problems just \n keep stackin' up on us.
I was banking on \n them violating \n the contract!

And that stuff she 
 chooses for drowning 
 them is rot-gut. She 
 needs to be careful.
Syd, guess who \n just got paid!
That little \n drift rat!
Yeah, I guess the cheap \n stuff has a lot of bad \n things mixed in there...
He probably means \n "The Forbidden Land."
After bringing in the haul from that strange place, I couldn't \n contain my excitement at the treasures we discovered, \n not knowing Vogo was preparing a more difficult challenge...
Sounds like we're gonna \n get a penalty on that \n last shipment to boot.
Those who follow the \n teaching of the tablets \n gain great fortune.
Ugh! \n How dare they!?
Anyway, here's your \n reward for today's job.
Think I'll keep \n that Banga's \n little secret.
Really? Even after all \n that, I can get paid?
Huh? \n Who isn't?

I just wish there was 
 something we could do to 
 help ease that burden. 
 Maybe Misai knows...
Awesome, I've got some gems now.
r Open Menu
Meet Syd
Power Kat Up \n With Gems
Use the Map and Set a \n Navi Marker at Your Destination
What are those giant hands doing there?
Ugh, what's \n that smell?
Keep it down... \n I'm doing some \n important work.
Please be very, \n very quiet.
I had an idea. \n You know the \n Forbidden Land?
If it's loaded with ore, \n one good trip and we \n can pay off Mustache.
Think it's \n that easy?
There's a reason it's called \n the Forbidden Land.
Forbidden Land
I'm not sending any \n of my people into \n that kind of danger.
H-Hey, what are you-!?
Leave it to the \n Gravity Shifter!
I fought things that make \n the Scarabs in the Forbidden \n Land look like pets.
Honestly, I could use \n the workout!
And...
You don't have \n to do this alone.
Look.
You...
Kat, I can't bring us \n down any closer. \n Can you make it?
Sure!
Leave the rest \n up to me!
Find a "Tablet"
Ugh... Everything just \n went dark.
I better stay away from \n that fog stuff.
Meow!

With a name like the 
 "Forbidden Land," I was 
 expecting something a 
 little more scary.
But this place is \n more strange than \n anything...
Anyway, I can't \n stand around...
I have to gather a \n ton of ore for the \n Banga Settlement.
Better find the \n "tablets" Syd mentioned.

Those who follow the 
 teaching of the tablets 
 gain great fortune, or 
 something like that.

No idea what that means, 
 but I guess I should 
 start with the island 
 in front of me.
Maybe this is what Syd \n meant by "tablets"?
There's something \n written here...
Defeat your enemies \n to reveal the path.
Seems like a complicated \n way of saying defeat \n everything.
Those hands! They moved! \n And there's a new \n island.

Defeat your enemies? I 
 guess I was right about 
 that tablet wanting me 
 to take down Nevi.

So I better keep 
 following the 
 instructions from 
 the tablets.
Time to find the next \n island and some more \n ore!
I'm just gonna take out the Nevi.
Nevi!?
It's a stone tablet, and something's written on it...
Find a "Tablet" to Proceed \n Deeper into the Forbidden Land
Defeat Your Enemies \n to Reveal the Path
Hey, there's another one of those stone tablets.
Break all of the Ore Deposits
Another one of those?
Gravity Ore
That's my sign to move on.
I can't shift, but I can still throw...
Defeat Your Enemies \n without Shifting
There's a ton of 'em this time! Better use my new power.
More? Maybe I can take 'em down by throwing something at 'em.
Ore
Is this island sinking!?
Race Down to Mine the Ore \n Before the Island Sinks
The island's sinking again! The ore'll go with it!
If the island keeps sinking, there'll be nothing left to mine.
I hope I have enough left to mine...
This isn't looking good.
Stone Tablet: \n Defeat your enemies to reveal the path.
Stone Tablet: \n Mine all of the ore.
Stone Tablet: \n Defeat your enemies without shifting.
Stone Tablet: \n Defeat your enemies and beware the mist.
Stone Tablet: \n Offer me seven spiked things.
Stone Tablet: \n Quickly defeat your enemies.
Stone Tablet: \n Race down to mine the ore before the island sinks.
Stone Tablet: \n Follow the ground and make your escape.
It's too dangerous out here.
*Cough* *Cough* I need to get out of here.
Hmm, that's not right.
Huh? Does that mean I failed?
Enemies
Spiked things, huh...
Beware the mist? I'm guessing it means that gas down there.
Shoot, can't rely on my power...
Defeat Your Enemies \n to Reveal the Path
I can't shift...
Is it just me, or is this mist getting higher?
The mist is going away...
Hmm, maybe the island is moving up and down?
So I get my power back as long as I obey the tablets.
Spiked Things Offered
Offer Me Seven Spiked Things
Well, now I know what it means by "offer."
Didn't I just take them out!?
They're gonna keep coming...
Quickly, huh. Guess it's time to bust out a special move.
Quickly Defeat Your Enemies
So I just need to get across the cacti without shifting?
I guess I need to stick to the cacti.
Follow the Ground \n and Make Your Escape
My powers are gone again!
Look at all that ore! The Forbidden Land is a win!
Check out the size of that thing!
My powers are back, I can reach the next island now.
Okay, I'll make sure Syd \n gets his share.
The Forbidden Land beyond the gravity storm was \n a strange world - a rift plane.

It's not much, but it's 
 better than nothing. 
 Things are tight around 
 here.
